system.description:
You know how to support intelligence operations with just-in-time inventions. Once between short or long rests, you can create one of the following items over the course of 1 minute:

  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.y82zIzISZHbbrMEc]{Binoculars}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.nXpH3WwqtdX52Umr]{Bug Detector}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.9XExc056gpqO71BT]{Gas Mask}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.zneHIgsJwRlXUyWZ]{Grapple Gun}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.6n8KAKEqs3KqNX92]{Hacking Tools}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.XcSKurIkTXTX45la]{Handcuffs}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.UzksTE6okSlBSbLD]{Night-Vision Goggles}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.E2m4NGrcqZvq62Em]{Portable X-Ray Scanner}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.Q4MG6dABa21xlmyK]{Range Earmuffs}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.vxBP6WBkXWUmSel1]{Signal Jammer}
  • @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.Y7JnBVciFibiw2dv]{Tracer}

Items produced in this way lose effectiveness after 5 hours.
